settings.faq_1_description: We understand there are some differences between an online and an in-store shopping experience, which is why there are a few slight variations in the way we handle returns and exchanges for both.
settings.faq_2_description: Sometimes our availability online differs from our in-store inventory. If you canâ€™t find your size feel free to contact us at info@peterjacksons.com or (03) 9415 6281 to inquire about stock availability at our warehouse or your nearest store.
settings.faq_3_description: Standard Shipping - Australia Post Network. Free Standard shipping on all orders over $99 within Australia. All orders take on average 1-3 business days to process before shipping. Standard Domestic Shipping - $10 (Free on orders over $99) Melbourne Metro: 1-3 business days. Other capitals: 3-5 business days. Regional: 5-7 business days.
settings.faq_4_description: We accept all major credit cards in-store and online. We also accept payments through Paypal for online purchases and Afterpay for in-store and online purchases. Visa, Mastercard and Amex have a small transaction percentage attached.
